Content: A musical show organized by Sri Lanka Army to encourage Artists and Musicians and to provide an opportunity for the music fans to enjoy, was held in Anuradhapura yesterday. The musical show was held at Anuradhapura Urban Council Grounds with the attendance of a large number of music fans. It has been organized by the 21st Brigade of the Army and many popular singers sang to the music provided by Sahara Flash Band. The Army has taken steps to hold the musicl show named Ekwa Sitimu, island wide. Wanni Security Forces Brigade Commander Major General Kumudu Perera and Governor Ananda Kularatne were present at the show.
